20110120150152.000|20110120150154.000|TR0|the people that she assumed were her 
20110120150154.000|20110120150157.000|TR0|family.  Well, those doubts led her to the 
20110120150157.000|20110120150200.000|TR0|web site for missing and exploited 
20110120150200.000|20110120150202.000|TR0|children.  That site proved what her 
20110120150202.000|20110120150205.000|TR0|instincts had been telling her all along.

20110120150210.000|20110120150213.000|TR0|girl snatched from a New York hospital by

20110120150517.000|20110120150519.000|TR0|

20110120150524.000|20110120150527.000|TR0|we looked at time lines.  What we tried to 
20110120150527.000|20110120150530.000|TR0|do was rule cases out.  Could she have

20110120150535.000|20110120150538.000|TR0|worked this case for almost 24 years and
